document.full_text: formula one commercial supremo bernie ecclestone will miss the season-opening race in melbourne as he will head to new york to talk to officials about staging a race on staten island, local media reported on wednesday.
document.title: formula one to talk to ny mayor about staten island
lines_and_colors: formula one commercial supremo bernie ecclestone will miss the season-opening race in melbourne as he will head to new york to talk to officials about staging a race on staten island, local media reported on wednesday.
